persona.summary: A developer, writer, and thinker blending deep technical work in scripting environments with a sharp philosophical lens. Combines a functional-first coding mindset with metaphor-driven writing, often exploring themes of embeddedness, agency, and human-nonhuman relations. Embraces coding, writing, and dialogue as co-evolving processes.
